homepage.hero.subtitle.message: A content authenticity verification service based on the C2PA standard. Verify the origin and integrity of images and videos through AI fingerprinting and digital signatures.

homepage.features.title.description: The title of the features section

homepage.features.subtitle.message: Discover why verifying the authenticity of digital content is crucial and the problems BornID solves.
homepage.features.subtitle.description: The subtitle of the features section

homepage.features.fakenews.title.description: Title for the fake news feature

homepage.features.fakenews.description.message: False information presented as news, damaging the reputation of individuals and organizations and causing social confusion.
homepage.features.fakenews.description.description: Description for the fake news feature

homepage.features.fakenews.item1.message: Distortion of social perception due to the spread of fake news.
homepage.features.fakenews.item1.description: First item for the fake news feature

homepage.features.fakenews.item2.message: Increase in economic damage cases from the dissemination of fake news.
homepage.features.fakenews.item2.description: Second item for the fake news feature

homepage.features.fakenews.item3.message: Inducement of public opinion manipulation and social chaos for political and economic purposes.
homepage.features.fakenews.item3.description: Third item for the fake news feature

homepage.features.copyright.description.message: Intellectual property infringement and ownership controversies arising from AI-generated content.

homepage.features.copyright.item1.message: Unauthorized reuse of existing creative works by AI learning.
homepage.features.copyright.item1.description: First item for the copyright feature

homepage.features.copyright.item2.message: Copyright conflicts between original content creators and AI-generated works.
homepage.features.copyright.item2.description: Second item for the copyright feature

homepage.features.copyright.item3.message: Increase in legal disputes over licensing and distribution rights.
homepage.features.copyright.item3.description: Third item for the copyright feature

homepage.features.deepfake.description.message: Increased risk of privacy invasion and criminal activity due to the misuse of deepfake technology.

homepage.features.deepfake.item1.message: Invasion of privacy through facial synthesis and voice forgery.
homepage.features.deepfake.item1.description: First item for the deepfake feature

homepage.features.deepfake.item2.message: Occurrence of defamation and blackmail crimes through malicious manipulation.
homepage.features.deepfake.item2.description: Second item for the deepfake feature

homepage.features.deepfake.item3.message: Legal loopholes that make it difficult for victims to respond directly.
homepage.features.deepfake.item3.description: Third item for the deepfake feature

homepage.features.tampering.title.description: Title for the content tampering feature

homepage.features.tampering.description.message: Degradation of social trust due to content tampering and forgery.
homepage.features.tampering.description.description: Description for the content tampering feature

homepage.features.tampering.item1.message: Dissemination of false information or gaining unfair advantages with manipulated images and videos.
homepage.features.tampering.item1.description: First item for the content tampering feature

homepage.features.tampering.item2.message: Growing need for information verification systems that can distinguish authenticity.
homepage.features.tampering.item2.description: Second item for the content tampering feature

homepage.technology.c2pa.title.message: What is C2PA (Coalition for Content Provenance and Authenticity)?

homepage.technology.c2pa.description.message: C2PA is an open technical standard that enables verification of the source and authenticity of digital content. Also known as "Content Credentials," this technology enables secure recording and tracking of the history (provenance) of digital media from creation through editing to distribution.

homepage.technology.c2pa.diagram.description: C2PA technology concept diagram placeholder text

homepage.technology.credentials.descript.message: In an environment where digital content manipulation is becoming easier and misinformation spreads rapidly, there is a growing need to record and verify the origin and change history of content in a reliable way. The C2PA open technical standard was developed to solve the following problems:

homepage.technology.benefits.transparenc.message: Transparently provide the origin and change history of digital content

homepage.technology.benefits.identificat.message: Support identification of intentional misinformation or manipulated content

homepage.components.manifest.description.message: The core data structure of C2PA that contains provenance information of assets and consists of the following elements.

homepage.components.binding.description.message: A mechanism that connects content and manifests, with two types available.

homepage.components.trust.description.message: C2PA verifies content authenticity through digital signatures using X.509 certificates.

homepage.usecases.journalism.item1.message: Provide source and editing history of news content

homepage.usecases.journalism.item2.message: Verify the source of uploaded content

homepage.usecases.creative.item1.message: Protect copyright and specify source of digital content

homepage.usecases.ai.item1.message: Display AI-generated content and provide information about the models used

homepage.usecases.government.item1.message: Ensure authenticity of official documents and records

homepage.solution.subtitle.message: Providing reliable solutions for digital content authenticity verification.

homepage.solution.c2pa.description.message: Fully compliant with the international C2PA standard, perfectly compatible with tools from major companies like Adobe and Microsoft.

homepage.solution.fingerprinting.descrip.message: Provides robust technology that extracts unique features of images and videos using CNN-based deep learning.

homepage.solution.sdk.description.message: We currently offer an SDK for iOS (Swift), with support for Android coming soon. Easily integrate BornID's powerful features into your mobile app.
